title: Rural life of Mexico
brief_description: A study of the life of isolated communities in the mountains of Mexico. Living largely by agriculture and using methods of cultivation which have scarcely changed during the centuries, these Mexicans still wear their regional costumes unselfconsciously and dance at fiesta time their traditional dances.
